name: bacon.atom
description: A garbage collectable alternative to Bacon.Model

scripts.dist: npm run dist:umd & npm run dist:umd.min & npm run dist:es & npm run dist:cjs & wait
scripts.dist:cjs: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n bacon.atom -i src/bacon.atom.js -f cjs -o dist/bacon.atom.cjs.js
scripts.dist:es: NODE_ENV=           rollup -c -n bacon.atom -i src/bacon.atom.js -f es  -o dist/bacon.atom.es.js
scripts.dist:umd: NODE_ENV=dev        rollup -c -n bacon.atom -i src/bacon.atom.js -f umd -o dist/bacon.atom.js
scripts.dist:umd.min: NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -n bacon.atom -i src/bacon.atom.js -f umd -o dist/bacon.atom.min.js
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run dist && npm run test
